source.54be889b:
file_path = "../input/ro007"

#Step 1 - collect data
points = np.genfromtxt(os.path.join(file_path,'Circle.csv'), delimiter=',')
# Plot the data
x = points[:, 0].reshape(-1, 1)
y = points[:, 1].reshape(-1, 1)
plt.scatter(x, y, c='blue', alpha=0.5)
plt.title('Scatter plot of data')
plt.xlabel('x')
plt.ylabel('y')
plt.show()
source.e3545024:
ransac = RANSACRegressor(base_estimator=LinearRegression(),
                         min_samples=500, max_trials=1000,
                         loss='absolute_loss', random_state=100,
                         residual_threshold=30)
#
# Fit the model
#
ransac.fit(x, y)
source.5bc4ee96:
#
# Get the Inlier mask; Create outlier mask
#
inlier_mask = ransac.inlier_mask_
outlier_mask = np.logical_not(inlier_mask)
#
# Create scatter plot for inlier datset
#
plt.figure(figsize=(10, 10))
plt.scatter(x[inlier_mask], y[inlier_mask],
            c='steelblue',
            marker='o', label='Inliers')
#
# Create scatter plot for outlier datset
#
plt.scatter(x[outlier_mask], y[outlier_mask],
             c='limegreen',
             marker='s', label='Outliers')
#
# Draw the best fit line
#
line_X = np.arange(0,500 ,1)
line_y_ransac = ransac.predict(line_X[:, np.newaxis])
plt.plot(line_X, line_y_ransac, color='black', lw=2)
#plt.scatter(xL, yL, c='blue', alpha=0.5)
plt.legend(loc='upper left', fontsize=12)
plt.show()
